title: Punters Reckon There’s A Bit Of Party Dust For The Nostrils In Jen’s ‘Friends’ Reunion Pic
text:
Thanks for signing up!

Earlier this morning, we reported the blessed news that Jennifer Aniston had made her Instagram debut with a heart-warming Friends selfie. The flick of the gang has since amassed over 8 million double-taps and been commented on by the likes of Ellen and Mariah Carey.

‘Tis a lovely photo isn’t it?

Well, after the image began circulating the web, some Nancy Drews began to notice something (or some… things) on a phone in front of Matthew Perry.

Look, I’m not saying it’s anything, but, well… I’m just going to leave this here…



Interesting…

READ MORE Are The Spice Girls Reuniting To Jam Pack Their Nostrils With Party Powder?

Punters began to point out the phone in the image.

“What is happening?!?! Forget it, I’m not going to question it. I’m just going to be grateful and enjoy it…says the entire fandom,” Jessica Capshaw commented.

Whats that on the phone in Jen Aniston's first Instagram post? #KennedyMolloy pic.twitter.com/iwvuvudhnC — Kennedy Molloy (@kennedymolloy) October 16, 2019

Given how viral the photo is, I’m obsessed with the fact that more people haven’t been commenting on #PhoneGate, focusing instead on the fact the Queen Jen has joined with Kingdom of the ‘Gram.

Whatever it is, I’m just stoked she’s finally here, too.

Glad to see they’re having a ball.

Until next time, internet sleuths.
description: After Jennifer Aniston and her 1st Instagram pic began circulating the web, some began to notice something on a phone in front of Matthew Perry.
